name: Path of Mage
storyline:
You are a young sorceress who is stuck in the dungeons filled with skeletons!   
Develop your magic abilities in order to survive and fight your way through and defeat bosses.
summary:
Grab your spell book and prepare to blast through dungeons of skeletons!  
  
Path of Mage is an action role playing game where you take control of a young sorceress, fighting her way through dungeons filled with skeletons and bosses! You start small from a simple Fireball and grow up to summoning Blizzards and Tornadoes.  
  
Develop your abilities and defeat your enemies with your demolishing magic!
